judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
 ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION
 COMPANY PETITION NO. 308 OF 1978
 In the matter of Companies Act, I
 of 1956.
 And
 In the matter of M/s. Shree
 Shakti Mills Ltd., (in
 Liqn.)
 Mr. Amit Shethi i/by Wadia Ghandhy & Co.
 for Ms. Ajay Poddar.
 Mr. S. C. Gupta, Official Liquidator
 present.
 ..
 CORAM : S.U. KAMDAR, J.
 DATE : 20TH JANUARY,2005.
 ORDER ON OFFICIAL LIQUIDATOR S REPORT DATED
 16.9.2004.
 P.C.
 1. Mr. Sethi appearing for Mr. Ajay Poddar
 states that large number of workers are paid back by
 them. He further states that he has necessary
 documents of assignment in his favour in respect of
the said claims of the workers. He is directed to
 produce the necessary documents before the Official
 Liquidator and the official Liquidator to scrutinise
 the same within a period of two weeks from today.
 After scrutinising the said documents, the Official
 Liquidator will place modified report for sanction
 before the Court.
